title: Oh shala shala lyrics Kaadhal Solla Vanthaen Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Oh Shala Oh Shala
Kaadhalin Laali Laali Ketpen
Oh Shala Oh Shala
Vaazhkkaiyin Thozhi Naanum Paarthen

Kalloori Koyilaa dhevadhai vaasalaa
Un moochu Kaathu pattadhaale
En kaalgal Pandhupola meley Oh ooo oh..Kudhitheney Kushiyaagavey
Boomi Poovai Pola aanadhey
Kadal Vanam Adu Yaavumey Nirammaarudey
Asaiyaamal Unai Paarkkiren
Vergal Kaaladiyil Poothadhey
Sedhukkaamal Silaiyaaginen Ada Naanumey

Questionaai Poanaval, Answeraai Varugiraal
Kalloori Kaalam Moonu Aandu
Unnoadu Vaazhavendum Neendu Oho..
Leyley Leyley Leyley
Mudhal Thooral Adhil Kaayavey
Jenmam Nooru kodi Aagumey
Maru Thooral Madhiyaanamey Naayamaa
Thalaikodhi Aval Saappidum
Mejai medhu thadam Aagiren
Sidharaadho Oru Saadhamey Yenginen

Oh Shala Oh Shala
Kaadhalin Laali Laali Ketpen
Oh Shala Oh Shala
Vaazhkkaiyin Thozhi Naanum Paarthen

Arugey Nee Amarndhaayadi
Tholum Tholum Kadhai Pesudhey
Urasaadhey Uyir Koaburam Saayudhey

Azhagaana Oru Oorvalalm
Neeyum Naanum Serndhu Poavadhe
Perundhey Kula Saamiyaai Aanadhey

Perundhin Puzhudhiyum
Pookkalaai Maarudhey
Urchaagam Melum Melum Aera
Mandrodum Megamaaga Maara
Leyley Leyley Leyley

seo.description: Get the complete Oh shala shala lyrics Kaadhal Solla Vanthaen Song Lyrics from Kadhal Solla Vandhen. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Yuvan and sung by Yuvan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
